author: lektran
msg: Convert all uses of json event types to chained requests with the common json event at the end.

author: lektran
msg: Added a common resquest mapping for sending json responses based on the request attributes, requests requiring json responses should chain the request.  Removes the need for a json event wrapper for every type of event. Based on idea put forward by Bob Morley OFBIZ-2778

author: shalin
msg: SOLR-1667 -- PatternTokenizer does not reset attributes such as positionIncrementGap
